303,106|283,126|268,126|231,169|195,196|195,211|223,211|243,231|263,231|283,211|303,231|323,211|423,211|443,231|483,231|503,211|523,211|543,212|583,212|603,232|623,212|643,232|663,212|683,212|703,232|723,212|783,212|803,232|823,212|843,232|863,212|923,212|943,213|1103,213|1123,233|1143,213|1323,213|1343,214|1403,214|1423,234|1443,214|1723,214|1743,215|1763,215|1783,235|1803,215|1823,215|1843,235|1863,215|1923,215|1943,235|1958,220|1962,208|1948,172|1738,150|1410,141|1090,126|679,136|571,126|343,126|323,106 273-01|Letters|,|Orders|and|Instructions|.|October|1755|.|273|.
803,305|783,307|763,309|743,317|723,321|603,321|583,319|483,319|463,317|443,315|343,315|323,313|263,313|243,317|222,317|222,361|199,382|202,405|219,420|218,426|223,426|243,406|323,406|343,407|523,407|543,408|723,408|743,409|923,409|943,410|983,410|1003,430|1043,430|1063,410|1123,410|1143,431|1163,431|1183,411|1203,411|1223,391|1263,391|1283,411|1323,411|1343,412|1403,412|1423,432|1443,412|1523,412|1543,413|1723,413|1743,414|1885,414|1884,400|1947,370|1944,334|1945,325|1943,325|1923,323|1903,323|1883,321|1663,321|1643,319|1603,319|1583,317|1403,317|1383,315|1363,315|1343,311|1323,315|1303,315|1283,319|1203,319|1183,317|1163,315|1143,313|1103,313|1083,315|1063,319|943,319|923,317|883,317|863,315|843,313|823,307|803,305 273-02|for|Bread|;|the|Commi√üsary|having|no|Orders|to

1423,2368|1403,2387|1283,2387|1263,2386|1163,2386|1143,2385|1023,2385|1003,2384|903,2384|883,2383|783,2383|763,2382|643,2382|623,2381|523,2381|503,2380|383,2380|363,2379|263,2379|243,2378|241,2378|241,2422|228,2439|253,2455|251,2472|323,2472|343,2473|423,2473|443,2474|523,2474|543,2475|623,2475|643,2476|723,2476|743,2477|823,2477|843,2478|923,2478|943,2479|1023,2479|1043,2480|1063,2480|1083,2460|1103,2480|1123,2480|1143,2481|1223,2481|1243,2482|1323,2482|1343,2483|1423,2483|1443,2484|1523,2484|1543,2485|1623,2485|1643,2486|1723,2486|1743,2467|1763,2487|1823,2487|1843,2488|1916,2488|1914,2403|1935,2392|1923,2392|1903,2391|1803,2391|1783,2390|1663,2390|1643,2389|1543,2389|1523,2388|1443,2388|1423,2368 273-24|observing|to|take|up|all|the|Salt|which|the
1083,2460|1063,2480|1043,2480|1023,2479|943,2479|923,2478|843,2478|823,2477|743,2477|723,2476|643,2476|623,2475|543,2475|523,2474|443,2474|423,2473|343,2473|323,2472|251,2472|244,2523|256,2558|263,2558|283,2559|303,2567|323,2563|343,2561|363,2560|423,2560|443,2561|503,2561|523,2562|583,2562|603,2563|663,2563|683,2564|743,2564|763,2565|823,2565|843,2566|883,2566|903,2586|923,2567|983,2567|1003,2568|1043,2568|1063,2569|1123,2569|1143,2570|1183,2570|1203,2550|1223,2571|1283,2571|1303,2572|1363,2572|1383,2573|1443,2573|1463,2574|1523,2574|1543,2575|1603,2575|1623,2576|1683,2576|1703,2577|1763,2577|1783,2578|1843,2578|1863,2579|1923,2579|1943,2580|1953,2580|1917,2511|1916,2488|1843,2488|1823,2487|1763,2487|1743,2467|1723,2486|1643,2486|1623,2485|1543,2485|1523,2484|1443,2484|1423,2483|1343,2483|1323,2482|1243,2482|1223,2481|1143,2481|1123,2480|1103,2480|1083,2460 273-25|waggons|,|provided|by|the|commi√üsary|,|will|carry|.
1203,2550|1183,2570|1143,2570|1123,2569|1063,2569|1043,2568|1003,2568|983,2567|923,2567|903,2586|883,2566|843,2566|823,2565|763,2565|743,2564|683,2564|663,2563|603,2563|583,2562|523,2562|503,2561|443,2561|423,2560|363,2560|343,2561|323,2563|303,2567|283,2559|263,2558|256,2558|262,2574|265,2616|260,2635|263,2635|303,2635|323,2636|383,2636|403,2637|443,2637|463,2638|503,2638|523,2639|563,2639|583,2640|643,2640|663,2641|683,2621|703,2641|723,2642|763,2642|783,2643|823,2643|843,2644|883,2644|903,2664|923,2645|963,2645|983,2646|1023,2646|1043,2647|1083,2647|1103,2648|1163,2648|1183,2649|1223,2649|1243,2650|1283,2650|1303,2651|1343,2651|1363,2652|1423,2652|1443,2653|1483,2653|1503,2654|1543,2654|1563,2655|1603,2655|1623,2656|1683,2656|1703,2657|1743,2657|1763,2658|1803,2658|1823,2659|1883,2659|1903,2660|1943,2660|1961,2661|1969,2610|1953,2580|1943,2580|1923,2579|1863,2579|1843,2578|1783,2578|1763,2577|1703,2577|1683,2576|1623,2576|1603,2575|1543,2575|1523,2574|1463,2574|1443,2573|1383,2573|1363,2572|1303,2572|1283,2571|1223,2571|1203,2550 273-26|There|will|come|down|some|of|the|country|wag|-
683,2621|663,2641|643,2640|583,2640|563,2639|523,2639|503,2638|463,2638|443,2637|403,2637|383,2636|323,2636|303,2635|263,2635|260,2635|246,2685|231,2709|226,2737|249,2738|263,2724|283,2725|343,2725|363,2726|423,2726|443,2727|503,2727|523,2728|583,2728|603,2729|663,2729|683,2730|743,2730|763,2731|823,2731|843,2732|903,2732|923,2733|983,2733|1003,2734|1063,2734|1083,2735|1123,2735|1143,2736|1203,2736|1223,2737|1283,2737|1303,2738|1363,2738|1383,2739|1443,2739|1463,2740|1483,2740|1503,2760|1523,2740|1543,2741|1603,2741|1623,2742|1683,2742|1703,2743|1763,2743|1783,2744|1843,2744|1863,2745|1923,2745|1943,2746|1964,2746|1953,2716|1961,2661|1943,2660|1903,2660|1883,2659|1823,2659|1803,2658|1763,2658|1743,2657|1703,2657|1683,2656|1623,2656|1603,2655|1563,2655|1543,2654|1503,2654|1483,2653|1443,2653|1423,2652|1363,2652|1343,2651|1303,2651|1283,2650|1243,2650|1223,2649|1183,2649|1163,2648|1103,2648|1083,2647|1043,2647|1023,2646|983,2646|963,2645|923,2645|903,2664|883,2644|843,2644|823,2643|783,2643|763,2642|723,2642|703,2641|683,2621 273-27|gons|,|which|must|also|be|loaded|up|with|Salt|.
263,2724|249,2738|294,2740|289,2793|284,2808|303,2808|323,2809|363,2809|383,2810|403,2810|423,2790|443,2811|463,2811|483,2791|503,2812|543,2812|563,2813|603,2813|623,2814|663,2814|683,2815|723,2815|743,2816|783,2816|803,2817|843,2817|863,2818|923,2818|943,2819|983,2819|1003,2820|1043,2820|1063,2821|1103,2821|1123,2822|1163,2822|1183,2823|1203,2843|1223,2843|1243,2824|1283,2824|1303,2825|1343,2825|1363,2826|1403,2826|1423,2827|1463,2827|1483,2828|1523,2828|1543,2829|1583,2829|1603,2830|1643,2830|1663,2831|1723,2831|1743,2832|1783,2832|1803,2833|1843,2833|1863,2834|1903,2834|1923,2835|1948,2835|1947,2818|1980,2790|1964,2746|1943,2746|1923,2745|1863,2745|1843,2744|1783,2744|1763,2743|1703,2743|1683,2742|1623,2742|1603,2741|1543,2741|1523,2740|1503,2760|1483,2740|1463,2740|1443,2739|1383,2739|1363,2738|1303,2738|1283,2737|1223,2737|1203,2736|1143,2736|1123,2735|1083,2735|1063,2734|1003,2734|983,2733|923,2733|903,2732|843,2732|823,2731|763,2731|743,2730|683,2730|663,2729|603,2729|583,2728|523,2728|503,2727|443,2727|423,2726|363,2726|343,2725|283,2725|263,2724 273-28|As|there|is|some|clothing|wanting|to|complete
423,2790|403,2810|383,2810|363,2809|323,2809|303,2808|284,2808|276,2832|231,2857|234,2878|255,2887|254,2896|283,2896|303,2897|323,2897|343,2898|383,2898|403,2899|443,2899|463,2900|483,2900|503,2920|523,2921|543,2901|563,2902|603,2902|623,2903|663,2903|683,2904|723,2904|743,2905|763,2905|783,2906|823,2906|843,2907|883,2907|903,2888|923,2888|943,2908|963,2909|983,2909|1003,2910|1043,2910|1063,2911|1103,2911|1123,2912|1163,2912|1183,2913|1203,2913|1223,2914|1263,2914|1283,2915|1323,2915|1343,2916|1363,2896|1383,2896|1403,2897|1423,2917|1443,2918|1483,2918|1503,2919|1543,2919|1563,2920|1603,2920|1623,2921|1643,2921|1663,2922|1703,2922|1723,2923|1763,2923|1783,2924|1823,2924|1843,2925|1863,2925|1883,2926|1923,2926|1942,2927|1938,2925|1951,2878|1948,2835|1923,2835|1903,2834|1863,2834|1843,2833|1803,2833|1783,2832|1743,2832|1723,2831|1663,2831|1643,2830|1603,2830|1583,2829|1543,2829|1523,2828|1483,2828|1463,2827|1423,2827|1403,2826|1363,2826|1343,2825|1303,2825|1283,2824|1243,2824|1223,2843|1203,2843|1183,2823|1163,2822|1123,2822|1103,2821|1063,2821|1043,2820|1003,2820|983,2819|943,2819|923,2818|863,2818|843,2817|803,2817|783,2816|743,2816|723,2815|683,2815|663,2814|623,2814|603,2813|563,2813|543,2812|503,2812|483,2791|463,2811|443,2811|423,2790 273-29|the|Companies|at|Fort|Cumberland|,|you|are
903,2888|883,2907|843,2907|823,2906|783,2906|763,2905|743,2905|723,2904|683,2904|663,2903|623,2903|603,2902|563,2902|543,2901|523,2921|503,2920|483,2900|463,2900|443,2899|403,2899|383,2898|343,2898|323,2897|303,2897|283,2896|254,2896|252,2922|234,2961|249,2973|251,2983|263,2983|283,2984|303,2984|323,2985|343,2985|363,2986|403,2986|423,2987|443,2987|463,2988|503,2988|523,2989|543,2989|563,3010|583,2990|603,2991|643,2991|663,2992|683,2992|703,2993|723,2993|743,2994|783,2994|803,2995|823,2995|843,2996|863,2976|883,2996|903,2997|923,2997|943,2998|963,3018|983,2999|1023,2999|1043,3000|1063,3000|1083,3001|1103,3001|1123,3002|1163,3002|1183,3003|1203,3003|1223,3004|1263,3004|1283,3005|1303,3005|1323,3006|1343,3006|1363,3007|1403,3007|1423,3008|1443,3008|1463,3009|1483,3009|1503,3010|1543,3010|1563,3011|1583,3011|1603,3012|1643,3012|1663,3013|1683,3013|1703,3014|1723,3014|1743,3015|1783,3015|1803,3016|1823,3016|1843,3017|1863,3017|1883,3018|1923,3018|1943,3019|1947,3019|1948,3001|1986,2982|1984,2949|1942,2927|1923,2926|1883,2926|1863,2925|1843,2925|1823,2924|1783,2924|1763,2923|1723,2923|1703,2922|1663,2922|1643,2921|1623,2921|1603,2920|1563,2920|1543,2919|1503,2919|1483,2918|1443,2918|1423,2917|1403,2897|1383,2896|1363,2896|1343,2916|1323,2915|1283,2915|1263,2914|1223,2914|1203,2913|1183,2913|1163,2912|1123,2912|1103,2911|1063,2911|1043,2910|1003,2910|983,2909|963,2909|943,2908|923,2888 273-30|to|take|up|for|that|purpose|forty|Coats|,|thirty|-|nine
863,2976|843,2996|823,2995|803,2995|783,2994|743,2994|723,2993|703,2993|683,2992|663,2992|643,2991|603,2991|583,2990|563,3010|543,2989|523,2989|503,2988|463,2988|443,2987|423,2987|403,2986|363,2986|343,2985|323,2985|303,2984|283,2984|263,2983|251,2983|255,3010|232,3042|253,3051|255,3067|263,3067|283,3067|303,3068|323,3068|343,3069|363,3069|383,3050|403,3070|423,3071|443,3071|463,3072|483,3072|503,3073|543,3073|563,3074|583,3074|603,3075|623,3075|643,3076|663,3076|683,3077|703,3077|723,3078|743,3078|763,3079|783,3079|803,3080|823,3080|843,3081|863,3081|883,3082|923,3082|943,3063|963,3083|983,3084|1003,3084|1023,3085|1043,3085|1063,3086|1083,3086|1103,3087|1123,3087|1143,3088|1163,3088|1183,3089|1203,3089|1223,3090|1243,3090|1263,3091|1303,3091|1323,3092|1343,3092|1363,3073|1383,3093|1403,3094|1423,3094|1443,3095|1463,3075|1483,3096|1503,3096|1523,3097|1543,3097|1563,3098|1583,3098|1603,3099|1623,3099|1643,3100|1683,3100|1703,3101|1723,3101|1743,3109|1763,3105|1783,3103|1803,3103|1823,3104|1843,3104|1863,3105|1883,3105|1903,3086|1923,3086|1943,3107|1957,3107|1941,3087|1947,3019|1943,3019|1923,3018|1883,3018|1863,3017|1843,3017|1823,3016|1803,3016|1783,3015|1743,3015|1723,3014|1703,3014|1683,3013|1663,3013|1643,3012|1603,3012|1583,3011|1563,3011|1543,3010|1503,3010|1483,3009|1463,3009|1443,3008|1423,3008|1403,3007|1363,3007|1343,3006|1323,3006|1303,3005|1283,3005|1263,3004|1223,3004|1203,3003|1183,3003|1163,3002|1123,3002|1103,3001|1083,3001|1063,3000|1043,3000|1023,2999|983,2999|963,3018|943,2998|923,2997|903,2997|883,2996|863,2976 273-31|waistcoats|,|and|fifty|-|six|pair|of|Breeches|;|thirty|-
383,3050|363,3069|343,3069|323,3068|303,3068|283,3067|263,3067|255,3067|256,3081|255,3099|231,3121|267,3141|279,3169|301,3163|320,3154|323,3151|326,3151|348,3141|805,3147|823,3180|845,3180|863,3164|875,3164|889,3150|925,3151|933,3173|933,3174|999,3151|1177,3169|1461,3169|1480,3178|1483,3178|1503,3178|1504,3178|1537,3165|1719,3169|1978,3163|1980,3136|1957,3107|1943,3107|1923,3086|1903,3086|1883,3105|1863,3105|1843,3104|1823,3104|1803,3103|1783,3103|1763,3105|1743,3109|1723,3101|1703,3101|1683,3100|1643,3100|1623,3099|1603,3099|1583,3098|1563,3098|1543,3097|1523,3097|1503,3096|1483,3096|1463,3075|1443,3095|1423,3094|1403,3094|1383,3093|1363,3073|1343,3092|1323,3092|1303,3091|1263,3091|1243,3090|1223,3090|1203,3089|1183,3089|1163,3088|1143,3088|1123,3087|1103,3087|1083,3086|1063,3086|1043,3085|1023,3085|1003,3084|983,3084|963,3083|943,3063|923,3082|883,3082|863,3081|843,3081|823,3080|803,3080|783,3079|763,3079|743,3078|723,3078|703,3077|683,3077|663,3076|643,3076|623,3075|603,3075|583,3074|563,3074|543,3073|503,3073|483,3072|463,3072|443,3071|423,3071|403,3070|383,3050 273-32|eight|Hats|and|eighty|Shirts|;|which|you|are|to|have
